name: Petcore Europe
goal:
Petcore Europe is the European association and the voice of the entire PET value chain in Brussels since 1993. PET is an outstanding packaging material, and it is the largest plastic material recycled in Europe.

Petcore Europe represents all other associations and a significant number of companies involved in PET manufacture, PET packaging design and conversion, PET post-consumer recycling and other related activities. Detailed information is available on https://www.petcore-europe.org
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: All European initiatives, policies and legislation related to sustainability (e.g. eco-design, LCA and post-consumer waste management and recycling), the European Circular Economy and plastics strategy, and all other other related environmental, health and consumer safety matters, the Circular Plastics Alliance, etc.
